de.title: Food and Drinks
de.description: Learn vocabulary for common foods and drinks in German, plus how to order, describe, and ask about meals.

activities.title: Introduction to Food Vocabulary
activities.content:
Let's start with common foods:

Brot – Bread
Milch – Milk
Apfel – Apple
Käse – Cheese
Ei – Egg
Fisch – Fish
Fleisch – Meat
Obst – Fruit
Gemüse – Vegetables

🍽️ Practice saying each word aloud and try to remember at least 5 of them.

activities.title: Drinks Vocabulary
activities.content:
Common drinks:

Wasser – Water
Kaffee – Coffee
Tee – Tea
Milch – Milk
Saft – Juice
Bier – Beer
Wein – Wine

💡 Example sentence:
Ich trinke Saft. – I drink juice.

activities.title: Ordering Food
activities.content:
Phrases to order food:

Ich möchte ein Brot, bitte. – I would like a bread, please.
Haben Sie Tee? – Do you have tea?
Ich nehme die Suppe. – I’ll take the soup.

✅ Tip: 'möchte' is used for polite requests.

activities.question: Translate: 'Ich möchte ein Brot, bitte.'
options: I would like a bread, please.
activities.correct_answer: I would like a bread, please.
activities.explanation: 'Ich möchte' is a polite way to say 'I would like'.

activities.title: Talking About Meals
activities.content:
You can describe what you eat or drink:

Ich esse Käse. – I eat cheese.
Ich trinke Wasser. – I drink water.
Ich esse Obst und Gemüse. – I eat fruit and vegetables.

✅ Practice forming sentences with the new words.

activities.title: Extended Practice
activities.content:
Combine food and drinks in sentences:

Ich trinke Kaffee und esse ein Ei. – I drink coffee and eat an egg.
Ich möchte Saft und Brot, bitte. – I would like juice and bread, please.

✅ Tip: Use 'und' to connect multiple items.

activities.question: Which phrase means 'I drink coffee and eat an egg'?
options: Ich esse Kaffee und trinke Ei.
Ich trinke Kaffee und esse ein Ei.
Ich trinke Tee und esse Brot.
Ich esse Fisch und trinke Milch.
activities.correct_answer: Ich trinke Kaffee und esse ein Ei.
activities.explanation: The correct structure is 'Ich trinke [drink] und esse [food]'.

de.title: Common Verbs
de.description: Learn essential German verbs and practice using them in sentences.

activities.title: Introduction to Common Verbs
activities.content:
Important verbs:

gehen – to go
kommen – to come
sehen – to see
sprechen – to speak
essen – to eat
trinken – to drink
lernen – to learn
schreiben – to write
lesen – to read
spielen – to play
arbeiten – to work
wohnen – to live
fahren – to drive/go
laufen – to run
fragen – to ask
antworten – to answer

activities.title: Verbs in Sentences
activities.content:
Examples:

Ich gehe zur Schule. – I go to school.
Wir lernen Deutsch. – We learn German.
Er spielt Fußball. – He plays soccer.
Sie liest ein Buch. – She reads a book.

activities.title: Forming Sentences with Subjects
activities.content:
Subjects:
Ich – I
Du – You (informal)
Er / Sie – He / She
Wir – We
Ihr – You (plural)
Sie – They / You formal

✅ Example:
Du lernst Deutsch. – You learn German.
Wir schreiben einen Brief. – We write a letter.

activities.title: Questions with Verbs
activities.content:
To ask questions:

Was machst du? – What are you doing?
Wo gehst du hin? – Where are you going?
Was liest du? – What are you reading?

✅ Tip: The verb often comes second in German questions.

activities.question: Translate: 'What do you eat?'
activities.explanation: 'Was isst du?' is the correct question form in German.

de.title: Weather
de.description: Learn how to describe weather conditions in German with more details and practice sentences.

phrases: Heute ist es kalt und windig.

activities.title: Weather Vocabulary
activities.content:
Learn these words:

Sonne – sun
Regen – rain
Wind – wind
Schnee – snow
wolkenlos – clear
bewölkt – cloudy
heiß – hot
kalt – cold
neblig – foggy
stürmisch – stormy
regnerisch – rainy
sonnig – sunny
warm – warm
kühl – cool

activities.title: Describing the Weather
activities.content:
Example sentences:

Es ist sonnig. – It is sunny.
Es regnet. – It is raining.
Heute ist es kalt und windig. – Today it is cold and windy.
Morgen wird es warm sein. – Tomorrow it will be warm.

activities.title: Practice with Weather Sentences
activities.content:
Combine words:

Es ist heiß und sonnig. – It is hot and sunny.
Es ist regnerisch und windig. – It is rainy and windy.
Es wird morgen kühl sein. – It will be cool tomorrow.

activities.question: Translate: 'It is rainy and windy.'
activities.explanation: Correct German translation for 'rainy and windy' is 'regnerisch und windig'.

de.title: Transportation
de.description: Learn about transportation modes in German and how to talk about traveling.

activities.title: Transportation Vocabulary
activities.content:
Modes of transport:

Auto – car
Fahrrad – bicycle
Bus – bus
Zug – train
Flugzeug – airplane
Schiff – ship
Taxi – taxi
U-Bahn – subway
Straßenbahn – tram
Motorrad – motorcycle
Fähre – ferry

Places:
Haltestelle – stop
Bahnhof – train station
Flughafen – airport

activities.title: Using Transportation in Sentences
activities.content:
Examples:

Ich fahre mit dem Bus. – I go by bus.
Wir fliegen nach Berlin. – We fly to Berlin.
Der Zug kommt um 8 Uhr. – The train arrives at 8 o'clock.
Nehmen Sie die U-Bahn. – Take the subway.

activities.question: Translate to German: 'I go by bicycle.'
activities.explanation: 'Ich fahre mit dem Fahrrad' means 'I go by bicycle.'

activities.title: Travel Practice
activities.content:
Create sentences:

Ich nehme das Flugzeug nach München. – I take the airplane to Munich.
Wir fahren mit dem Schiff. – We go by ship.
Er fährt mit dem Motorrad zur Arbeit. – He rides the motorcycle to work.

activities.question: Translate: 'We take the tram.'
activities.explanation: 'Wir nehmen die Straßenbahn.' means 'We take the tram.'
